data.prayer: Lord, please give apostles to expand the church into every neighborhood of Sud-Ouest, Burkina Faso.
data.verse: Therefore go and make disciples of all nations, baptizing them in the name of the Father and of the Son and of the Holy Spirit, and teaching them to obey everything I have commanded you.

data.location_label: Photo from the state of Sud-Ouest, Burkina Faso

data.prayer: Father, put your Bible in the hands of the 491,976, who are far from you and live in this place.
data.verse: How can a young person stay on the path of purity? By living according to your Word. I seek you with all my heart; do not let me stray from your commands.

data.section_summary: On average, 2 babies will be born in the next hour to families who are far from God in Sud-Ouest, Burkina Faso.
data.prayer: Jesus, reveal yourself to these new families.
Jesus, purify the 66,026 believers in the state of Sud-Ouest to not just be hearers, but doers of your Word.
data.verse: Blessed is the one who reads aloud the words of this prophecy, and blessed are those who hear it and take to heart what is written in it, because the time is near.

data.prayer: Spirit, make the Word of God a delight to the people of Sud-Ouest, like it was to David.
data.verse: I delight in your decrees; I will not neglect your Word.

data.prayer: Spirit, please convict each believer in Sud-Ouest, Burkina Faso to take up their calling as a priesthood of believers and pray for the 558,074 lost around them.
data.verse: you also, like living stones, are being built into a spiritual house to be a holy priesthood

data.prayer: Father, we ask for 124 new simple churches in the state of Sud-Ouest, Burkina Faso. Place a simple church in every community of the 624,100 people living here.
data.verse: And blessed be His glorious name forever; And may the whole earth be filled with His glory. Amen, and Amen.

data.section_summary:
the state of Sud-Ouest, Burkina Faso has a population of 624,100.

We estimate Sud-Ouest has 66,026 people who might know Jesus, 66,098 people who might know about Jesus culturally, and 491,976 people who do not know Jesus.

This is 1 believer for every 9 neighbors who need Jesus.

data.prayer: Spirit, reveal best practices for sharing the gospel in the state of Sud-Ouest.
